channel.title: [PI] letting new players choose starting stats
channel.description:
Are there any guides or tut's on how to change the starting stat's for new players.
For example
Max skiller hybrid pure
etc etc
This would help me out alot, thanks. PI base btw.

item.title: [PI] letting new players choose starting stats
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

you can change the “99” to the lvl you want the skills to be

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] letting new players choose starting stats

item.title: [PI] letting new players choose starting stats
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:427757”]If his master command looks anything like mine it isn’t that simple.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for (int i = 0; i < 24; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }[/quote]

That’s just a loop like I just posted in your help thread. It’s very simple if you just look at it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] letting new players choose starting stats
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

You have the commands?
EDIT: I’m sure you have the command “::master” on your server, u can copy that, change the command name, and change what skills you should lvl in, and what lvl you want in the lvls

Read full topic
